price: مۇسا قورقۇنچ ئىچىدە ئەتراپقا باققان ھالدا شەھەردىن چىقتى، ئۇ: «ئى پەرۋەردىگارىم! مېنى زالىم قەۋمدىن قۇتقۇزغىن» دېدى[21].
arabic: فَخَرَجَ مِنۡهَا خَآئِفٗا يَتَرَقَّبُۖ قَالَ رَبِّ نَجِّنِي مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fakharaja min'hā khāifan yataraqqabu qāla rabbi najjinī mina al-qawmi al-ẓālimīna
